column5: This space is ideal for those looking to experience East Austin, or those who want to be close to all of Austin's cool spots (Barton Springs, downtown, 6th Street, Lady Bird Lake, Rainy St.), while still being able to retreat into a quiet neighborhood. The house is designed with two separate living spaces, both having a private room and bathroom, with a kitchen dividing the spaces. Your space is the front half of the house, and you're welcome to use the kitchen, other living room, and backyard.
column8: Clean Cozy East Austin Private Room & Bathroom
